trigger.name: ASP.NET: Application restarts greater than 0 over the last 5 minutes
ASP.NET: Request wait time greater than 0 over the last 5 minutes
ASP.NET: Worker process restarts greater than 0 over the last 5 minutes
Exchange Address Book Service: NSPI RPC browse requests average latency greater than 1000ms seconds over the last 5 minutes
Exchange Address Book Service: NSPI RPC requests average latency greater than 1000ms seconds over the last 5 minutes
Exchange Address Book Service: Referral RPC requests average latency greater than 1000ms seconds over the last 5 minutes
Exchange Address Book service not running

trigger.expression: {Template_Microsoft_Exchange_2010_Client_Access:perf_counter[\MSExchange Availability Service\Average Time to Process a Free Busy Request].avg(300)}>5
trigger.name: Exchange Availability Service: Average time to process a Free Busy request greater than 5 seconds over the last 5 minutes
Exchange File Distribution service not running
Exchange Forms-Based Authentication service not running
Exchange OWA: Average search time greater than 5000ms over the last 5 minutes
Exchange Protected Service Host service not running
Exchange RPC Client Access: RPC averaged latency greater than 25ms seconds over the last 5 minutes
Exchange RPC Client Access: RPC requests greater than 40 over the last 5 minutes
Exchange RPC Client Access service not running

trigger.expression: {Template_Microsoft_Exchange_2010_Client_Access:perf_counter[\RPC/HTTP Proxy\Number of Failed Back-End Connection Attempts per Second].avg(300)}>0
trigger.name: RPC/HTTP Proxy: Number of failed back-end connection attempts per second greater than 0 over the last 5 minutes
